alert.note: Alert for Kent; New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 26 at 5:33PM EST until January 27 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of central and northern Delaware, central, northern, northwest and southern New Jersey and southeast Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The fog is rather inconsistent and variable across our area. Visibility may vary between less than a quarter mile to a couple miles at times, even driving from one town to the next. Drier are is forecast to start filtering in tonight, that will eventually improve conditions, especially by Saturday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
